Lectures

Lecture Schedule:

  • Week 1: What is Synthetic/Systems Biology?

  • Week 2: Regulating gene expression: LacI, TetR

  • Week 3: Systems-level (global) view of transcription

  • Week 4: Transcriptional Networks

  • Week 5: Guest Lecture by Charles Denby (Berkeley Yeast)

  • Week 6: High-throughput identification of gene function

  • Week 7: Metabolic Engineering

  • Week 8: Biosensors

  • Week 9: Applications of Biosensors

  • Week 10: Guest Lecture by Paul Opgenorth (Invizyne)
